title: I CANT PHURCASE RIOT POINTS
body:
I have tried to phurcase rp for so long now and i just cant.I dont have that problem where i cant open the "phurcase rp button". So when im writing the numbers of my MASTERCARD i press the buy button and then it says "You have encountered an error. Please try again later." like wtf pls riot fix ur shit!!!!!!


i hope u guys can respond/help me with this.

replies.body: There may be an issue with your method of payment, but we can take a closer look.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can help out individually.  We'll get back to you asap!
